title: How to Create Relaxing Piano Music for Sleep
excerpt: Learn how to generate the perfect relaxing piano music for sleep or meditation. This guide details how to use pitch, tempo, and melody controls to create soothing, low-pitched ambient tracks.

title: How to create sad music
excerpt: Want to create a sad, melancholic, or melancholic music? This guide will teach you how to use our prompt generator, by selecting the right options, to create a perfect prompt for sad, melancholic, or melancholic music.
